title: Do you miss Enrique Iglesias these days? - Quora

response.answer_text: I really do!!!!!!!!! I miss his music so much. His voice is very angelic and oh god i just miss him. He is very underrated and should be appreciated more. Singers like him are really needed. His songs “Bailando” and “Hero” is love.

To be honest “yes”. His last album came out in 2014 and after that he had released few singles. He's busy touring and life has changed for him after birth of his adorable twins (Nicholas and Lucy)... But We all fans hope he would return with more interesting songs and videos in coming years. Enrique loves his fans and that's a fact, so he wouldn't disappoint millions.
